top_comments.comment: This Is their First Content on Halloween And it is BOMBASTIC that You Will NEVER miss The Future Halloween Music Content … Imagine What They are gonna Give us … Ahhhh I’m Excited for their Future

Expectation: Just dance "Zombie" in Halloween costume
Real: Remix entire song, change choreography, setting the location and camera work like real comeback

I'm fascinated with PURPLE KISS, they always come up with new ideas, new content. I want to be a stan before their 2nd comeback because till now I'm just a supporter. I see the talent, the vocals, raps and dance, also creativity.
Now I'm just busy on my ults but I know that sooner or later I will be here stanning<3.
I still want to know who is that guy haha.
go 300K!
yuki's visuals and rapping are just on another level.
now this is what i mean when i talk about halloween kpop

I was waiting for purple kiss halloween
Esto estuvo bueniiiisimo. Me encanta el reversionado. Sigo prefiriendo la original pero me encanta que se pusieran creativas y trajeran algo distinto y especial.
yuki's visuals and rapping are just on another level.

Swan is so cute! Her acting in this is good, so i don't want it to sound like im saying she didn't pull off the vibe- cuz she DOES - I just find her so CHARMING, especially with pipes like those! And she's YOUNG! so as timegoes by, her voice will only get better and better and she's already starting with so much talent and ability! Wow!
now this is what i mean when i talk about halloween kpop
